fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to redirect every player using an attacking ability to yourself (1 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your defense level on any given night is equal to the number of attacks you received during the night.
> 0 attacks = Vulnerable
> 1 attack = Basic
> 2 attacks = Powerful
> 3 attacks = Unstoppable
> 4+ attacks = Overprotective
- You will gain a charge of any killing ability that you survive.
